DOC.brief_title: Cabergoline Versus GnRH Antagonist Rescue Cabergoline Prevention Ovarian Hyperstimulation Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ( OHSS ) serious complication assist reproduction . Complications OHSS include vascular thrombosis , pulmonary embolism , renal failure , electrolyte disturbance , ascites , hydrothorax , torsion ovary , abortion rarely death . Previous study reveal convert long GnRH agonist cycle GnRH antagonist cycle ( GnRH antagonist rescue ) reduce risk OHSS . Other study reveal cabergoline ( potent dopamine receptor agonist D2 receptor ) effective prevent OHSS . The aim study compare efficacy GnRH antagonist rescue combine cabergoline cabergoline prevention ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome high risk patient undergo ovarian stimulation IVF-ET long GnRH agonist protocol .
DOC.criteria: Patients undergo ovarian stimulation IVFET long GnRH agonist protocol high risk develop OHSS [ 20 follicle ( 90 % less 14 mm mean diameter ) serum estradiol â‰¥ 3000 pg/ml ] Fibrosis lung , swell inflammation around heart lung , hypertension , liver disease , heart valve disease allergy cabergoline ergot derivative .
